name: Big Wood
description:
Big Wood is an endless runner style game where you start as a little acorn and turn into a sprout, growing up past other tree branches and other obstacles contained within the forest.

Big Wood was made by our team: Moose Patrol, consisting of:
Katie Moses || Michael Sanchez || Sebastian Marlow

made using Phaser v2.12.0 created for CMPM 120/ARTG 120, or Game Design & Development Experience, at University of California, Santa Cruz during Spring 2019.
